fields.name: Completed_Text
fields.fieldText:
Locations Updated!


All units in {!recordId.Name__c} have been updated to {!SelectedChoice}. Click Finish to complete the wizard.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Has_Allocated_Units_Text
fields.fieldText:
Block/Sub Block {!recordId.Name__c} has at least 1 unit that is housing an animal, and is allocated.


Please make arrangements to move the animals out of any units in this Block/Sub Block.


Click Finish to Exit

screens.name: Initial_Screen
screens.label: Initial Screen

fields.name: Start_Screen_Text
fields.fieldText: To change the status of the current Location and any child Locations, select an option below

fields.name: InitialScreenIgnoreAllocatedWarning
fields.fieldText: WARNING! - Setting the above checkbox will update the status of the Units that may house animals

screens.helpText:
This wizard allows you to update the status for all units within a single block at the same time.


For example if the block needs to be closed for maintenance, you can use this to update the whole block to unavailable.

fields.name: Location_RecordType_Error_Text
fields.fieldText: ERROR! - The Location {!recordId.Name__c} has no Record Type

fields.name: Unit_Has_Allocation_Text
fields.fieldText:
Unit {!recordId.Name__c} has an allocation.


Please make arrangements to move the animal(s) out of the the unit.


Click Finish to Exit
